title: MathWorks India Compensation EDG 2024
content:
Education: M.Tech CSE in Tier-1 college
Years of Experience: 0
Date of the Offer: Aug 2024
Company:MathWorks
Title/Level: Engineer in EDG 
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 24,40,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus:2L joining bonus + 1L relocation bonus 
Stock bonus: variable upto 2L (Stakeholder bonus)
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  29.39L

Is EDG a good job position to start your career ? Read some mixed reviews about the company.

title: Need help if I should select or decline the offer
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science (Tier 3)
Years of Experience: 2+ Years(2022 Grad)
Prior Experience: SDE1 at Startup and 1 MNC(Product Based)
Prev Salary - (22 LPA Base + 8.5 variable) - 30.5 LPA.

Date of the Offer: September
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Remote
Company - Series E funded startup(Might IPO in 2 years).
Salary: 28 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus(RSUs): 20 Lakh(Vested Equally over 4 Years)
Bonus: 3 LPA performance
Benefits: 4K per month internet Reimbursement+ 50k one time remote allowance.
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37 LPA for first year.

Tried negotiating alot but this is the max that they are offering me.

Can someone please guide me if its a good offer just from monetary perspective at my YOE. I am lined up for appraisals in January in my current organizationsand will also be eligible for appraisals in the organization where I got the offer which will also happen in january as per HR.
company: Series E Funded Startup(might Ipo In 2 Years).
cleanCompany: Series E Funded Startup Might Ipo In 2 Years

title: WayFair | Salesforce | Urgent Suggestion
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier 3
Years of Experience: 6.1
Prior Experience: Product Based
Previous Compensation: 29 LPA fix

Offers:

**WayFair**
Date of the Offers: Sept '24
Company: WayFair
Title/Level: SDE 3 (L3)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 66 LPA fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: Relocation benefits for 14 days (travel, stay, etc)
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: NA
Total comp 1st year ~ 66LPA
Benefits: Standard (Food included, cab facility, cult.fit membership)
Org: Supply Chain

**Salesforce**
Date of the Offers: Sept '24
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: MTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 38L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4.5L
Stock bonus: 60K USD
Bonus: 10% (3.8L)
Total comp 1st year ~ 59LPA, From second year 55 LPA
Benefits: Standard (Food included, wellness 5K/month, etc)
Org: Mulesoft

Which should be the ideal choice here, depending on WLB, culture, learning opportunity?
How is Mulesoft as an organization?
How are increments at both WayFair and Salesforce?
WayFair newly setting up teams in India, heard mixed reviews (mostly positive) about wlb and culture.And no risk of stablity atleast for 2-3 years.
How's the WayFair as a brand, will tier1 companies recruiter reach out easily after wayfair?
No more negotiation in both the companies.
